Reviews.Title: Great little phone!
Reviews.Author: Bethany Brooke
Reviews.Content: We got this for our 8 year-old, and it's been perfect for the needs we had for it.  It's easy to use, great for texting, can't hold a lot of games, but can hold a few, and has been pretty reliable so far.  Cute color, and good reception on the H20 wireless network.

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Yakanu Prosper
Reviews.Content: The product was good. I recommend it to everyone who wants a good phone. I bought it for my wife and she loves it.

Reviews.Title: blu dash jr 140 unlocked dual sim phone (pink)
Reviews.Author: HAMIS ALI KIBWEBWE
Reviews.Content: up to the expectations. it has all prescribed components and it works well. delivery was also very prompt. I  would recommend it to any willing buyer. it would have been awesome if you could pack it with its protective cover. I love it.

Reviews.Title: Complete, practical and super-functional (Completo, practico y super funcional)
Reviews.Author: Grace Cristina Villalobos Vargas
Reviews.Content: I recommend it 100%. In Costa Rica it works perfect! I like this phone. (Lo recomiendo al 100%. En Costa Rica funciona perfecto! Me gusta este teléfono.)

Reviews.Title: Ok
Reviews.Author: victor sosa
Reviews.Content: Thought it was capadable with Att and it wasn't  other than that nice phone but had to bu another phone that was able to hook up with att

Reviews.Title: screen broke
Reviews.Author: David
Reviews.Content: The phone screen is broke already.. Is there anyway to repair it? Otherwise the phone is ok. Please reply back

Reviews.Title: good cell phone
Reviews.Author: mauren
Reviews.Content: very good phone easy to handle, I practice at a great price lightweight and nice I really liked it gave my daughter.

Reviews.Title: I don't like it
Reviews.Author: SweetCandy
Reviews.Content: I got this phone, connected to my network, it only work with my WAN connection, the 3g connection don't work with my network, and it dope calls, I have another phone , LG prime, it work very well with my network so I know its not the network fault its the phone. got to find a better android.  Its alright if you only make a few calls an texts. but not for long term use and the battery don't stay charge long. 2.5/3 hours all I get. I forgot to add, the camera really sucks, the picture quality is really bad unless you are under a lot of light and don't think about doing a self photo..one touch on screen and that's it.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: Yael
Reviews.Content: Horrible phone even for my 11year old....always says no service...and when she makes calls it always goes dead ughhhh..lesson learned go to the retailer

Reviews.Title: i do not get this phone as yet
Reviews.Author: Andrew R.
Reviews.Content: i can not say any thing  about this phone as yet but it look like a good phone so far

Unlocked Dual SIM 3.5-Inch High Resolution HVGA Display, 1 GHz Processor
GSM-GPRS-EDGE 2G 850/900/1800/2100
2MP Camera, Android 2.3 Gingerbread, 512MB ROM-256MB RAM
3.5mm Audio Jack, FM Radio, MP3 Player, MP4 Player
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Dash JR D140 Unlocked Dual Sim Phone (Pink)
